Changelog

Nov 13, 2018

Daemon V. 1.0.10

  • Added tracking (view only) wallets
  • Added private keys
  • Added change password option
  • Added remote daemon option
  • Added determistic wallets
  • Added mnemonic seeds
  • Added import GUI key
  • Added search by paymentID

Nov 13, 2018

Wallet V. 1.0.17-beta

  • Added new graphics
  • Wallet enhancement
  • Added remote node option

Mar 07, 2018

Daemon V. 1.0.11

  • Added support for Debian
  • Solve network sync issue
